early_life_description: Born in Gary, Indiana, as the eighth of ten children in the Jackson family. Showed talent in music and performance early.
young_adult_description: Became lead singer of the Jackson 5 and gained international fame.
adult_life_description: Achieved unprecedented solo success, releasing albums like 'Thriller'. Married Lisa Marie Presley and later Debbie Rowe; fathered three children.
late_life_description: Passed away in 2009; remembered as the 'King of Pop'.

early_life_description: Grew up in a large family in Arkansas before moving to Indiana.
young_adult_description: Married Katherine Scruse and had 10 children, including Michael.
adult_life_description: Managed the Jackson 5 and launched his children into stardom.
late_life_description: Died in 2018, leaving a legacy in music management.

early_life_description: Raised in Indiana; met Joseph Jackson and married young.
young_adult_description: Mother of 10 children; supported their musical careers.
adult_life_description: Maintained family cohesion despite fame and public attention.
late_life_description: Lives to see her family continue in music and entertainment.

early_life_description: Youngest of the Jackson children; showed early talent in dance and singing.
young_adult_description: Began acting in television shows and released debut album as a teen.
adult_life_description: Internationally successful solo career with hits like 'Rhythm Nation'.
late_life_description: Remains active in music and philanthropy.

early_life_description: Part of the Jackson family, trained in music and dance from an early age.
young_adult_description: Began performing with the family group before launching solo career.
adult_life_description: Known for her solo music career and appearances on reality TV.
late_life_description: Lives privately while staying connected to the Jackson family.

early_life_description: Eldest of the Jackson 5 siblings, trained in music from childhood.
young_adult_description: Lead singer and bassist for the Jackson 5 alongside his brothers.
adult_life_description: Released solo albums and continued performing with Jackson family projects.

early_life_description: Grew up in Gary; played guitar for Jackson 5.
young_adult_description: Performed with Jackson 5 on international tours.
adult_life_description: Released solo projects and played with family ensembles.

early_life_description: One of the middle Jackson siblings; part of the Jackson 5.
young_adult_description: Performed with his brothers and toured internationally.
adult_life_description: Participated in family and solo projects.

early_life_description: Youngest Jackson brother; joined later iterations of the Jackson 5.
young_adult_description: Performed on stage with his brothers and released solo albums.
adult_life_description: Continues music work and occasional family performances.

early_life_description: Oldest Jackson sibling; part of the family's musical roots.
young_adult_description: Released solo music and supported her siblings.

early_life_description: Oldest son of Michael Jackson and Debbie Rowe.
Daughter of Michael Jackson and Debbie Rowe.
young_adult_description: Began modeling and acting as a teen.

early_life_description: Also known as Blanket; youngest child of Michael Jackson.
Born in Orlando, Florida. Trained and worked as a nurse.
young_adult_description: Met Michael Jackson while working in dermatology; later married him.
adult_life_description: Mother of Michael Jackson's two eldest children: Michael Joseph Jackson Jr. and Paris Jackson.
late_life_description: Lives privately and occasionally participates in her children's lives.

early_life_description: Born in Memphis, Tennessee, only child of Elvis Presley and Priscilla Presley. Showed early interest in music and performance.
young_adult_description: Pursued a career in music and acting in the 1980s and 1990s.
adult_life_description: Married Michael Jackson in 1994 and divorced in 1996; no children from this marriage.
late_life_description: Continued her music career and remained involved in preserving her father's legacy until her passing in 2023.

early_life_description: Born in Qatar; became a successful businessman and entrepreneur.
adult_life_description: Married Janet Jackson in 2012; divorced in 2017.

early_life_description: Son of Janet Jackson and Wissam Al Mana.
